intro: Ibadja, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its thick, fleshy leaves and showy, clustered flowers. Ibadja thrives in humid, well-drained soil and requires indirect sunlight for optimal growth.
